<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the sum of all known probabilities is less than one, evenly distribute</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the complement of sum to unknown probabilities. Otherwise, set unknown</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// probabilities to zeros and continue to normalize known probabilities.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
